ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Welcome Call Complete Date field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Welcome_Call_Complete_Date__c), ( NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Welcome_Call_Complete_Date__c))) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Advisor Team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the 'Welcome Call Complete Date' value.
